io.apptik.comm.jus.toolbox

Class DiskBasedCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.apptik.comm.jus.toolbox.DiskBasedCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache

    public class DiskBasedCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cache
    Cache implementation that caches files directly onto the hard disk in the specified directory. The default disk usage size is 10MB, but is configurable.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.apptik.comm.jus.Cache

        Cache.Entry

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiskBasedCache(java.io.File rootDirectory)
      Constructs an instance of the DiskBasedCache at the specified directory using the default maximum cache size of 5MB.
      DiskBasedCache(java.io.File rootDirectory, int maxCacheSizeInBytes)
      Constructs an instance of the DiskBasedCache at the specified directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the cache.
      Cache.Entry get(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the cache entry with the specified key if it exists, null otherwise.
      java.io.File getFileForKey(java.lang.String key)
      Returns a file object for the given cache key.
      void initialize()
      Initializes the DiskBasedCache by scanning for all files currently in the specified root directory.

      Puts the entry with the specified key into the cache.
